Class InvertedAxisRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.AxisRenderer
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.InvertedAxisRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer

    public class InvertedAxisRenderer
extends AxisRenderer
    Intended to be used on plots with an inverted Y axis
    Author:
    Tom Parker
